title: Tomato â€” Bacterial spot
description: Dark, water-soaked lesions on fruit and foliage caused by various Xanthomonas and Pseudomonas species; use certified seed and apply copper-based bactericides.

treatment.chemical: Apply copper-based bactericides such as fixed copper when plants are 12 inches tall and repeat every 7-10 days.
treatment.organic: Use certified seed, practice crop rotation, avoid overhead watering, and use copper sprays.
